com.adp.marketplace.connection.utils

Class ConnectionValidatorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adp.marketplace.connection.utils.ConnectionValidatorUtils

  • public class ConnectionValidatorUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    ConnectionValidatorUtils is a singleton utility class that provides convenience methods to perform validations on connection configurations and returns true if valid and false otherwise.

    In case the connection or configurations are null or empty or invalid ConnectionValidatorException are thrown.

    Author:
    tallaprs

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionValidatorUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConnectionValidatorUtils getInstance()
      Returns a lazy loaded singleton instance of ConnectionValidatorUtils
      boolean validate(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Returns true if configuration has required SSL attributes, client credentials and valid url's, false otherwise or validation exceptions.
      boolean validateAuthCodeAuthUrl(AuthorizationCodeConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Returns true if AuthorizationCodeConfiguration has client credentials and required authorization code parameters, false otherwise
      boolean validateAuthCodeTokenRequest(AuthorizationCodeConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Returns true if AuthorizationCodeConfiguration has required ssl attributes, client credentials and required authorization code, url parameters, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConnectionValidatorUtils getInstance()
        Returns a lazy loaded singleton instance of ConnectionValidatorUtils
        Returns:
        ConnectionValidatorUtils a singleton instance

      • validate

        public boolean validate(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
                 throws ConnectionValidatorException
        Returns true if configuration has required SSL attributes, client credentials and valid url's, false otherwise or validation exceptions.
        Parameters:
        connectionConfiguration - has the configuration details for this ConnectionConfiguration
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if validation passed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ConnectionValidatorException - Exception thrown in case of missing certificate file, invalid file path or invalid trust store or key store, missing client credentials or authorization code required parameters or null or empty connection or configurations

      • validateAuthCodeAuthUrl

        public boolean validateAuthCodeAuthUrl(AuthorizationCodeConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
                                throws ConnectionValidatorException
        Returns true if AuthorizationCodeConfiguration has client credentials and required authorization code parameters, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        connectionConfiguration - has the configuration details for AuthorizationCode connection
        Returns:
        boolean valid returns true if validation passed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ConnectionValidatorException - Exception thrown in case of missing certificate file, invalid file path or invalid trust store or key store, missing client credentials or authorization code required parameters or null or empty connection or configurations

      • validateAuthCodeTokenRequest

        public boolean validateAuthCodeTokenRequest(AuthorizationCodeConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
                                     throws ConnectionValidatorException
        Returns true if AuthorizationCodeConfiguration has required ssl attributes, client credentials and required authorization code, url parameters, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        connectionConfiguration - has the configuration details for AuthorizationCode connection
        Returns:
        boolean valid returns true if validation passed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ConnectionValidatorException - Exception thrown in case of missing certificate file, invalid file path or invalid trust store or key store, missing client credentials or authorization server required parameters or null or empty connection or configurations
